description: The code to identify the type of information documentID points to. Can be one of the following values - CBR (Carrier Booking Request Reference) - BKG (Booking) - SHI (Shipping Instruction) - SRM (Shipment Release Message) - TRD (Transport Document) - ARN (Arrival Notice) - VGM (Verified Gross Mass) - CAS (Cargo Survey) - CUS (Customs Inspection) - DGD (Dangerous Goods Declaration) - OOG (Out of Gauge) More details can be found on GitHub
